What is Voli?

Voli is a social enterprise aimed at improving people’s experience of retirement.

Using a marketplace business model Voli links transitioning retirees with tailored volunteering opportunities that directly connect with their core values. Voli engages new retirees using a web based platform,

Volies are prompted to contribute to the online marketplace - by putting forward their ideal volunteer role. This process can be likened to creating a one-off ‘classified ad’ about themselves.

For more, please watch the video on the left.
